name: 11.02 The Shoreline
description:
What happens after you die?

A question asked and avoided by millions of people on a daily basis.

Every night, after the music, a radio station opens the air to calls from listeners, and every night the restless souls trapped in purgatory clamor to be heard, to tell their story, be judged, and move on.  Not every arbitrator of the dead is the same; some will do more than just listen and instead try their best to help find what bound their wayward callers here to begin with.

In this Visual Novel, you play as one such host. Listen and converse with the dead and help find what regrets they were left with and how to overcome them through narrative choices.

Disclaimer: The release for Nanoreno 2023 did not quite get as far as the team wanted, however we've left the story off at a satisfying cliffhanger and hope to update with the full extent of the demo for next week. If you like what you experience here, we hope you'll check out future updates.

Known Issues: We are aware that the menu is hard to read on the message boxes at the moment - that is something we will be fixing. (The MAC version is untested as I don't have a MAC to test it on. If you have any problems, let us know and we'll see what we can do.)

11.02 The Shoreline was developed by four friends as a challenge for Nanoreno 2023.

Backgrounds/UI/Sound Design: OSCEN

Character Art/Designs: MakioKuta

Writing: Fletcher H.

Title Screen/Coding: Faun

With music and SFX by: SoulProdMusic, Danisan, Rexlambo, Tokyo Music Walker, Tomh, FocusBay, jacekksiazek, and Litruv
